name: Spring/Break
description:
Search the prison to find your friend without being spotted, once you reach him you need to make it back to the start to win.

WASD - Movement, R to Restart.

The original version of this game was made by me as part of a two day game jam with some former colleagues, with some nice improvements added since.

Uses:

Art - https://www.kenney.nl/

Framework - https://love2d.org/

Web export - https://schellingb.github.io/LoveWebBuilder/

Source:

https://github.com/PulsarFlux/Spring-Break
